abstract: India's richest man Mukesh D Ambani incited public debate for building extravagant 27-story house in Mumbai, but now his neighbors are wondering why he has yet to move into his finished home.
snippet: An extravagant 27-story house built in Mumbai by India’s richest man, Mukesh Ambani, has been completed, but the owners apparently have not moved in — raising questions as to why.
lead_paragraph: An extravagant 27-story house built in Mumbai by India’s richest man, Mukesh Ambani, has been completed, but the owners apparently have not moved in — raising questions as to why.

headline.main: For Wealthy Indian Family, Palatial House Is Not a Home
headline.print_headline: For Wealthy Indian Family, Palatial House Is Not a Home
headline.seo: Mukesh Ambani’s 27-Story House Is Not His Home
